title: Calendar Integration
description: Subscribe to church calendars in Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, or any other calendar app

google.title: Google Calendar
google.description: Connect your Google account for real-time, two-way sync. Events are instantly added to your Google Calendar.

calendars.title: Calendars
calendars.description: Choose which calendars to sync to your Google account
calendars.churchDescription: Public events visible to all members
calendars.campusDescription: Select which campus calendars to sync

disconnectDialog.title: Disconnect Google Calendar?
disconnectDialog.description: This will stop syncing events to your Google Calendar.
disconnectDialog.deleteCalendars: Also delete calendars from my Google account
disconnectDialog.deleteCalendarsDescription: Remove the calendars created by Koinonia from your Google account

ics.title: Other Calendar Apps (ICS)
ics.description: For Apple Calendar, Outlook, and other apps. Updates may take up to 24 hours.

personal.title: My Calendar
personal.description: Events where you have assignments (invited or accepted) and hidden events you're invited to. Your role in each event is shown in the description.
personal.privateWarning: Keep this link private. Anyone with this link can see your assigned events.

regenerate.title: Regenerate Calendar Link?
regenerate.description: This will invalidate your current calendar subscription link. Any calendar apps using the old link will stop receiving updates. You'll need to re-subscribe with the new link.

public.title: Public Campus Calendars
public.description: Subscribe to see all public events for a campus. Anyone can subscribe to these calendars.

help.title: How It Works
help.subscription: Subscription calendars automatically sync with your calendar app. When events are added or updated in Koinonia, they'll appear in your calendar within 24 hours.
help.google: Google Calendar: Click "Add to Calendar" or go to Settings → Add calendar → From URL and paste the link.
help.apple: Apple Calendar: Click "Add to Calendar" or go to File → New Calendar Subscription and paste the link.
help.note: Note: These calendars are read-only. Changes made in your calendar app won't sync back to Koinonia.
